abc: This letter is in reference to the incident that took place on 18/07/2020 at 15.00 hours while transferring a patientfrom KYC hospital to ABC hospital. It was observed that the equipment in your ambulance were insufficient aavailable equipment were not in good condition. It was also observed that the maintenance of the ambulance wapoor which could have caused threat to the life of the patient. This is a gross negligence on your part, thereforeare hereby warned for the poor service and advised to maintain the ambulance with required equipment and timelmaintenance.
